history_summary: Test-agent, focused on Torch protocol integration with the relay system, primarily worked on defining and testing data serialization methods to ensure seamless transfer of Torch tensors. Progress was made in establishing a functional pipeline for basic tensor transmission, but significant challenges were encountered with handling complex data structures and optimizing performance for large-scale model deployment. The agent decided to prioritize addressing serialization bottlenecks and exploring more efficient data transfer protocols to overcome these limitations.
